task.title: Configuring Web UI users by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can configure Web UI users to administer the only by using the Web UI User Management page in the .

context.p: You can configure Web UI users by using the . You cannot configure Web UI users by using REST Administration APIs.
For more information about the properties that you must specify when you configure a Web UI user, see .
context.note: The user admin is a special user. This user cannot be deleted or have its role changed.

step.cmd: Go to the Web UI User Management page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, go to the Web UI Users link in the Create users pane.
From the Web UI menu, select Web UI Users.
To add a Web UI user, click the Add icon.
To delete a user, select the Web UI user and click the Delete icon.
To edit a user, select the Web UI user and click the Edit icon.
To reset the password of a user, select the Web UI user and click Other Actions > Reset Password.
